org.sakaiproject.time.api

Interface Time

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Comparable, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConvertTime, MyTime, Time
    Deprecated. 
    the use of time is discouraged in favour of java.util.Date. This interface will be removed in 2.0

    public interface Time
extends Cloneable, Comparable, Serializable

    Time ...
